name: 1-2 ★ALLSTON★ 3 Mins to Green Line T - Comfortable
neighborhood_overview:
We are in a great location, 3 min walk away from "Allston St- Green Line B" and very close to
– Grocery store
– Pizza restaurant (super important of course):
– Liquor store
– Convenience store
– Bar/restaurant
– Franciscan Children's Hospital
– Chestnut Hill Reservoir Lake: 5 minutes driving, 8 minutes by T (subway)
– Boston College: 5 minutes driving, 9 minutes by T (subway)
– Boston University: 7 minutes driving. 11 minutes by T (subway)
– Harvard University: 11 minutes driving
– Fenway Park: 10 minutes driving, 22 minutes by T (subway)
– Downtown Boston: 15 minutes driving, 26 minutes by T (subway)
-Kenmore-Fenway
-Backbay
-Copley Square
-Prudential Center

description:
CHECK IN: After 15:00
Check out: 11:00
Newly Renovated House..
Our home is 2 floors. The room is on the first floor.
Guests will share the kitchen and bathrooms with other guests.
Guests will have self check-in instruction before arriving.
3 mins WALK to (T) Green Line-B (Allston St)
Very close to BU, BC, Harvard University, MIT
In the middle of the best restaurants in Boston.
NO PARKING, park on the Commonwealth Ave, Brighton Ave, Harvard Ave which doesn't required PERMIT PARKING STICKER.

The space
Guests can use the shared kitchen, the shared bathroom and the dining room with pretty big table. We have coffee machine, microwave, oven-stove,utilities, fridge all in kitchen for the quests and they can use anything.
We also provide free coffee and tea. Feel free to make your own coffee to start fresh day.
In the bathroom we have toilet paper, shampoo,tooth brush and tooth paste, shower gel, hair dryer, air
